pages.text: These Concept Cores are containers. They need contents to properly work. Fill the content by the way of $(l:io_tools/interoperation_wand)Interoperation Wand$().
This container accepts any vanilla carpets and rails. Within an $(l:io_tools/interoperation_wand)Interoperation Wand$(), it can place the block in the world.
This container accepts sand and gravel. Within an $(l:io_tools/interoperation_wand)Interoperation Wand$(), it can place the block in the world.
This container accepts beetroot seed, carrot, potato and wheat seed. Within an $(l:io_tools/interoperation_wand)Interoperation Wand$(), it can recover your saturation.
This container accepts melon seed and pumpkin seed. Within an $(l:io_tools/interoperation_wand)Interoperation Wand$(), it can recover your saturation or place a pumpkin.
